Title: Features
Subtitle: Explore the key features that set our swimming performance platform apart. From personalized plans to advanced analytics, we've got you covered for an unparalleled swimming experience.

RowItems.Name: Item1
RowItems.ClassName: col-md-6 col-lg-3 d-flex align-items-stretch mb-5 mb-lg-0
RowItems.Title: Workout Calendar Integration
RowItems.Subtitle: Effortlessly manage your training schedule by integrating it with your calendar. Stay on top of your sessions with ease.

RowItems.Name: Item2
RowItems.ClassName: col-md-6 col-lg-3 d-flex align-items-stretch mb-5 mb-lg-0
RowItems.Title: B2B Club Integration
RowItems.Subtitle: Collaborate seamlessly with your swimming club. Enjoy exclusive features and synchronized training plans for a unified approach to excellence.

RowItems.Name: Item3
RowItems.ClassName: col-md-6 col-lg-3 d-flex align-items-stretch mb-5 mb-lg-0
RowItems.Title: Advanced Analytics
RowItems.Subtitle: Empower your training decisions with cutting-edge analytics. Gain insights into your performance metrics for continuous improvement.

RowItems.Name: Item4
RowItems.ClassName: col-md-6 col-lg-3 d-flex align-items-stretch mb-5 mb-lg-0
RowItems.Title: Import Workouts from Trackers
RowItems.Subtitle: Seamlessly integrate your activity tracker data. Import and analyze your workouts effortlessly, enhancing your training experience with precise insights from your wearable devices.
